# Contributing to Tech Club Website

Thank you for considering contributing to this project! Here are some guidelines to help you get started:

## Getting Started

- Fork the repository and clone it locally.
- Create a new branch for your feature or bugfix.
- Make your changes and commit them with clear messages.
- Push your branch and open a Pull Request (PR).

## Code Style

- Use Prettier and ESLint to format and lint your code.
- Run `pnpm format` and `pnpm lint` before submitting your PR.
- Ensure all tests pass with `pnpm test`.

## Commit Messages

- Use clear, descriptive commit messages.

## Pull Requests

- Describe your changes in detail.
- Reference related issues if applicable.
- Be responsive to feedback and suggestions.

## Reporting Issues

- Use the issue template to report bugs or request features.
- Provide as much detail as possible.

## Code of Conduct

- Please read and follow our [Code of Conduct](./CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
